text: Jue buyao rang shou ci an la de enhui [caifu] zhe renwei, linse dui tamen shi youyi de [ru bu jiao tian ke, bu shishe deng], qishi, linse dui tamen shi youhai de. Fuhuo ri, tamen suo linse de [caiwu] jiang xiang yige xiangquan yiyang tao zai tamen de bozi shang [zhu]. Tiandi jian de yiqie [yichan] dou shi an la de. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.
